comments:
As part of product customization the splash screen was changed from the default
to one provided by our feature. This works fine on Windows, but the splash
screen does not show on Mac OS X. The following is found in the error log.

Error Jul 18, 2004 13:13:35.499 Exception running command: c:\Program
Files\RichPalette\He3\eclipse -showsplash 600
java.io.IOException: CreateProcess: "c:\Program Files\RichPalette\He3\eclipse"
-showsplash 600 "C:\Program
Files\RichPalette\He3\plugins\com.richpalette.he3_0.7.0\splash.bmp" error=2
at java.lang.Win32Process.create(Native Method)
at java.lang.Win32Process.<init>(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Runtime.execInternal(Native Method)
at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Unknown Source)
at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.runCommand(Main.java:1163)
at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.handleSplash(Main.java:1129)
at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:176)
at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:644)
at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:628)

The fact that Win32Process is referenced in the stack trace is concerning.
*** Bug 70305 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

And the use of a DOS path 
C:\Program Files\RichPalette\He3\plugins\com.richpalette.he3_0.7.0\splash.bmp
makes no sense either.
Are you sure you are running on a Mac?
Is this path hardcoded?

Looks like I was a little to quick with this bug report. I am seeing a problem with changing the splash 
screen on Mac OS X. However, the provided stack trace was incorrect. No stack trace is produced and 
no error is written to the log; the splash screen is simply not displayed.

The provided stack trace was created with VirtualPC on Mac OS X if that gives you any insight into the 
actual problem.

Need to investigate for 3.0.1.
Matt have you solved the issue?
Pascal, Will this be fixed for 3.0.1 RC1?

Is there a list of steps required to change the splash screen on Mac OS X that I
could use to verify against? I was able to change the splash screeen on Windows
and Linux using the provided instructions, but the same steps don't seem to work
on Mac OS X. I have tried several additional steps, but no luck so far.

There is a document here:
http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/platform-core-home/docs/branding/BrandingYourApplication.html

Let us know if you still have problems changing your splash screen.

I did a quick test on our mac following the instructions, and it worked as expected.
Please re-open with details if you still have a problem.
